title: Coupling the high-temperature Fischer-Tropsch synthesis and the skeletal isomerization reaction at optimal operation conditions in the Power-to-Fuels process route for the production of sustainable aviation gasoline
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript

In this study we presented a concept process route for the production of sustainable aviation gasoline and investigated experimentally the high-temperature Fischer-Tropsch (HTFT) synthesis and the first upgrading step, the...
